name: Fiduciary Duty Notice
subject: Official Notice: Fiduciary Duty Compliance for {officer.name}
body:
Dear {officer.name},

This is an official notice regarding your fiduciary duties as a public officer with {officer.organization} in {officer.state}.

As a member of the Living Council, I am writing to remind you of your constitutional obligations and fiduciary duties to the people of Australia.

Your immediate attention and response to this matter is required within 14 days of receipt of this notice.

Please acknowledge receipt of this notice and provide written confirmation of your understanding of these obligations.

Regards,
{sender.name}
Living Council Member

Date: {notice.date}

name: Constitutional Oath Reminder
subject: Reminder: Constitutional Oath Obligations - {officer.name}

name: Accountability Notice
subject: Notice of Accountability Requirements - {officer.organization}

name: Transparency Requirements
subject: Transparency and Disclosure Requirements - {officer.name}
body:
Dear {officer.name},

This notice concerns transparency and disclosure requirements for public officers.

As a public servant with {officer.organization} in {officer.state}, you are required to maintain transparency in your official duties and disclose any conflicts of interest.

Key requirements include:
- Proper documentation of decisions
- Timely response to freedom of information requests
- Declaration of any potential conflicts of interest
- Adherence to ethical guidelines

Your cooperation in maintaining these standards is essential for public trust.

Please acknowledge receipt of this notice within 7 days.

Best regards,
{sender.name}
Living Council Member

Issued: {notice.date}
